_sText:
The weapon of "mass destruction" 
has finally been realeased.

<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/zfadpgK7oE0"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/zfadpgK7oE0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>

This map has a working artillery in it.
to control it you need to get in the control room.
There is a button in it to gain control of the artillery.
Here are the keys to control it.

To steer the artillery use: W A S D
To stop the artillery use : Right mouse button
To shoot the canisters use: Left mouse button
To exit the artillery use : E or jump

There are also gun barrels in the air which you have to shoot with the artillery to get them down. Or else its knifing time!

Notes

I will be realeasing a prefab to, So you mappers can add or modify it to place in your own maps. Also there will soon be a categorie CM (Cannon Mod) where all these kind of maps will be put in. So i hope to see lots of CM maps ^^

There were screens in the control rooms which were very handy controlling the artillery but i removed them because on the T screen it displayed the same as the CT screen, its a limitation of source. You can have to monitors in you map. BUT you cant have 2 cameras in your map! So unfortunately i know no other way making it easier to control. If you do send me a PM!!!!!

Bugs

elevator doors are shit
elevator is shit
Artillery can move through itself
cannisters sometimes explodes in the barrel
and some more crappie bugs I couldn't fix!

<h2>HAVE FUN<h2>
